channel.title: 99 str tips?
channel.description:
Yeah, I'm currently 82 str and I plan on [b]not[/b] going to PC to train.
Anytips?
[u]Monsters I was recommended:[/u] [i]Rock Crabs[/i] [i]Experiments[/i] [i]Magic Axes[/i] [i]Gorillas at MM place[/i]
Any tips for me getting 99 str (the fastest) :P

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @dark_child dark_child
item.description:
@dark_child wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:18, topic:134231”]I heard with strength the best xp is about 50k per hour.

I dont really know but i suggest you try going to the desert to that place where the bandits auto attack you if you are wearing something with saradomin on it. (like sara cape).

When i had a high level main i used to train there lots.

Also may want to not just bring food but also pray pots as protect from melee is pretty useful.[/quote]what i was gonna say that place is good, they are easy to hit, and fast for experience, btw they all attack you from just attacking one to

Read full topic

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

^ Wrong, it is against the rules to AFK train, like macroing. Guthans only heals with the special, and with out the person at his computer he couldn’t click it, and at bandits you can just stand there and be attacked with anything to do with the gods, like the cape, so no need for weights on the arrow keys…

Read full topic

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @Brett2 Brett`
item.description:
@Brett2 wrote:

go too the bandits at the bandit camp wearing a holy symbol, they att you continiously, my friend did for 17 hours with out even being at the computer or autoing =\ he left something on his arrow keys, he was wearing full guthans, it heals =\ and a ring of life.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

Well this is what Ive been doing lately…

Afking the dagannoths under the lighthouse until they become nonaggressive, then you go up to the lighthouses’ entrance floor and go back down so they go agro again. They dont hit too bad and you can stay down there forever if you have noted food. They drop high level herb seeds starting at irits, including snapdragons which sell for 30-40kea. The lvl 90s also drop clues but theyre usually shit. Ive done this from lvl 86 to 90 str so far and I think I might do it until 99. Its around 40-50k exp/hour and 200k+ per lvl in the 80s.

Another good alternative is slayer tasks.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I heard with strength the best xp is about 50k per hour.

I dont really know but i suggest you try going to the desert to that place where the bandits auto attack you if you are wearing something with saradomin on it. (like sara cape).

When i had a high level main i used to train there lots.

Also may want to not just bring food but also pray pots as protect from melee is pretty useful.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @to-believe to-believe
item.description:
@to-believe wrote:

Your probably gonna say, omg noobish idea but oh well.

Ever try the flesh crawlers in stronghold, you get 100exp per kill on them, so its not that bad.

ITs always empty when I’m there, so you get good exp and emptiness.

Exp per hour - 25k-40k per hour. not that bad actually

Read full topic

item.title: 99 str tips?
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Do haunted mine quest (I think that’s what it’s called) to get the salve amulet. Do tarns lair to get salve amulet (e).
Then go to the skeletons that you pass for damis in desert treasure. You probably will need quite abit of food though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

If i where you, I would go to Mm gorrilas. Or Obby demons…
Obbys are fun because there good training, If you use prayer pots, you get all the money back from drops. <-- doing that with range ;o its good.

Mm Gorrilas are fun, Cheap and good training, just bring a spare p pot just incase.
